EmailTemplate.name: Contact Pivotal.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your inquiry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We received your inquiry!
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, Thank you for your interest in Pivotal. Your request for more information has been passed onto the team. We will get back to you soon. In the meantime, we invite you to explore our resources <http://www.gopivotal.com/resources> and to read our blog <http://blog.gopivotal.com/> to see what extraordinary things we're up to. -The Pivotal Team
Follow Us: Twitter <http://twitter.com/gopivotal> | LinkedIn <http://linkedin.com/company/gopivotal> | Facebook <http://www.facebook.com/gopivotal> | Google+ <https://plus.google.com/105320112436428794490>
